item.title: Last.fm Recent Tracks with AngularJS
item.description: AngularJSis an MVC framework for javascript. It is best suited for round-tripping resources with a RESTful service. In this post, I will simply get a list of recent tracks from Last.fm, treating each track as a resource. The Last.fm API is documented here. There is no round-tripping in this example. Iâ€™ll also be utilizing Twitter Bootstrapfor layout. To start, create the AngularJS application and a controller for recent tracks. Since this is a simple application, there are no routes and views.
